name: @onwidget/astrowind
description: A template to make your website using Astro + Tailwind CSS.

scripts.build-fab-dev: cp ./env/.env-fab .env && astro build && cd ./dist && echo dev.find.bible >| CNAME && git init && git add . && git commit -m "auto-push" && git branch -M main && git remote add origin git@github.com:digitalbiblesociety/fab-dev.git && git push -f -u origin main
scripts.build-shin-mx: cp ./env/.env-mx .env && astro build && cd ./dist && echo mx.bible.cloud >| CNAME && git init && git add . && git commit -m "auto-push" && git branch -M main && git remote add origin git@github.com:digitalbiblesociety/shin-mx.git && git push -f -u origin main
scripts.build-shin-in: cp ./env/.env-in .env && astro build && cd ./dist && echo in.bible.cloud >| CNAME && git init && git add . && git commit -m "auto-push" && git branch -M main && git remote add origin git@github.com:digitalbiblesociety/shin-in.git && git push -f -u origin main
scripts.build-shin-ec: cp ./env/.env-ec .env && astro build && cd ./dist && echo ec.bible.cloud >| CNAME && git init && git add . && git commit -m "auto-push" && git branch -M main && git remote add origin git@github.com:digitalbiblesociety/shin-ec.git && git push -f -u origin main
